pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:5.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:5.3: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:6.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:6.3: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:6.4: ‘chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo … pe … bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo’”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:6.6: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:6.7: ‘chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo … pe … bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo’”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:6.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:6.12: ‘chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo … pe … bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:6.14: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:6.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:7.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:7.3: ‘māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:7.4: chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:7.5: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya, dosāpi gaccheyya, mohāpi gaccheyya, bhayāpi gaccheyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:7.6: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:7.7: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:7.8: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:8.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:9.2: adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:12.2: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo … pe … bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:14.2: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:15.2: “māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:15.3: ‘chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo … pe … bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:15.5: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya … pe … bhayāpi gaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:15.13: “māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:15.14: ‘chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo … pe … bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:15.16: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya … pe … bhayāpi gaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:16.1: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo… pe… bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:16.5: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:16.8: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:16.9: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo … pe … bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:16.12: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:17.1: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo… pe… bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:17.5: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:17.6: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:17.9: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:17.10: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo … pe … bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:17.13: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:17.14: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:19.1: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:19.2: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:22.2: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya āpajjati, na saha vatthujjhācārā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:25.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:25.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:25.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
